project.description: Given a list of space delimited keys ($DIRS), this job will get all values from $OLDKV and sets them in this cluster.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OLDKV
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Source etcdctl server (ETCD_PEERS endpoint works). Including port.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: DIRS
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Space delimited list of keys. Default keys are for mantra migrations. Must have a / in the beginning!

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DRY_RUN
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether to just output the commands or actually run them.
